c023c0e3-f04d-4cfb-b584-9a78786ee924.name: Lightning Calculator
c023c0e3-f04d-4cfb-b584-9a78786ee924.notes: or select intuitive mathematiciam for 3 extra points enable below

3b174c3b-3269-4c2a-920c-da10d36688fe.name: Single-Minded
3b174c3b-3269-4c2a-920c-da10d36688fe.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

1c701028-f74e-41c0-89f8-ef9b75795b75.name: Alternate Benefit
1c701028-f74e-41c0-89f8-ef9b75795b75.notes: Bonus to resist deception involving numbers

c5bba86d-0961-4e07-9ffc-3014ffc7bb74.name: Unfazeable
c5bba86d-0961-4e07-9ffc-3014ffc7bb74.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

2a71a8b0-41e8-462c-b442-451f6df56f85.name: Versatile
2a71a8b0-41e8-462c-b442-451f6df56f85.notes: +1 on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill and all Engineer rolls for new inventions

adc2f7ca-f28a-4ea3-b212-aff675f9b22b.name: Eidetic Memory
adc2f7ca-f28a-4ea3-b212-aff675f9b22b.notes: can choose photographic for extra 5 points by enabling option below

94f1de3d-a007-4a2e-9053-280fdb0fceda.name: Absent-Mindedness
94f1de3d-a007-4a2e-9053-280fdb0fceda.notes: -5 on all IQ and IQ-based skill rolls, save those for the task you are currently concentrating on. Once adrift in your own thoughts, you must roll against Perception-5 in order to notice any event short of personal physical injury.

6b9aa3d8-c277-4788-bec4-c96f85b2ce94.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
6b9aa3d8-c277-4788-bec4-c96f85b2ce94.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

d61f8015-3418-431f-9ad9-ca900ef8e074.name: Callous
d61f8015-3418-431f-9ad9-ca900ef8e074.notes: +1 to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy

4d9d679a-8215-4b6f-920b-58be8c188782.name: Code of Honor (Professional)
4d9d679a-8215-4b6f-920b-58be8c188782.notes: Adhere to the ethics of your profession; always do your job to the best of your ability; support your guild, union, or professional association.

34a60706-ef89-47e0-9e2e-2b9cae4d9b36.name: Curious
34a60706-ef89-47e0-9e2e-2b9cae4d9b36.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

4f3a9514-e71f-493d-87eb-f306ae9cb6d3.name: Delusions
4f3a9514-e71f-493d-87eb-f306ae9cb6d3.notes: Choose a delusion from -5, -10 or -15 depending on severity

9721e4d9-c691-43f8-bad3-18544235cdf5.name: Easy to Read
9721e4d9-c691-43f8-bad3-18544235cdf5.notes: Gives others +4 on all Empathy, Body Language, and Psychology rolls to discern your intentions or the truth of your words. They also get +4 to their IQ, Detect Lies, and Gambling rolls in any Quick Contest with your Acting, Fast-Talk, or Gambling skill when you try to lie or bluff.

90ff9b29-8837-4f91-9555-385fd0d5c89d.name: Indecisive
90ff9b29-8837-4f91-9555-385fd0d5c89d.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever a choice confronts you, modified downward by 1 for each alternative you can see. If you fail, you do nothing.

e3fc7315-646f-4528-b213-e5b9105fd62a.name: Klutz
e3fc7315-646f-4528-b213-e5b9105fd62a.notes: or total klutz by selecting below for an additional -10 points

858a9a58-ed28-46bf-8479-b9476b9cf4a1.name: Loner
858a9a58-ed28-46bf-8479-b9476b9cf4a1.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: to resist Influence skills: Diplomacy, Fast-Talk, Intimidation, Savoir-Faire, Sex Appeal, and Streetwise

4d17fa04-b36f-4c81-b810-3f80692c2f13.name: Post-Combat Shakes
4d17fa04-b36f-4c81-b810-3f80692c2f13.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

00ca75f7-bb5f-4895-9044-715cc8779dbd.name: Choose either unfit or very unfit

a5a3e00c-8191-4e85-bd25-97f1d0d4ab47.name: Unfit
a5a3e00c-8191-4e85-bd25-97f1d0d4ab47.notes: -1 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc. As well, you lose FP at twice the normal rate.

118c8086-1a35-4068-b6cf-c9fd60d50141.name: Very Unfit
118c8086-1a35-4068-b6cf-c9fd60d50141.notes: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc. You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the nromal rate.
